\begin{frame}[fragile]
\frametitle{Profiling a Python Script}


\begin{block}{ What }

Where is the time spent?

\end{block}

\pause

\begin{block}{ Why? }
\begin{itemize}

\item Know the bottle-necks.

\item Optimize intelligently.
\end{itemize}

\end{block}

\begin{block}{ How? }

Standard Library Profiling
\begin{itemize}

\item cProfile

\item Profile  (older pure python implementation)

\item hotshot  (deprecated)
\end{itemize}

Third Party Profiling Libraries
\begin{itemize}

\item line\_profiler

\item memory\_profiler
\end{itemize}

Commercial Web Application Profiling
\begin{itemize}

\item New Relic
\end{itemize}

\end{block}
\end{frame}

\begin{frame}[fragile]
\frametitle{Lowest Common Multiplier}


\textbf{Problem}

Given two numbers a,b find the lowest number c that is divisible by both a and b.

\pause

\textbf{Algorithm:}
\setbeamerfont{quote}{parent={}}
%
\begin{quote}{\ttfamily \raggedright \noindent
1.~Start~i~from~the~max(a,b)\\
2.~If~i~is~perfectly~divisible~by~a~and~b\\
~~~~i~is~the~answer\\
3.~Increment~i~by~max(a,b).~Goto~Step~1.
}
\end{quote}
\setbeamerfont{quote}{parent=quotation}
\end{frame}

\begin{frame}[fragile]
\frametitle{Save and Analyze Profiles}


\textbf{Problem:}
\begin{itemize}

\item Small functions are easy to profile in the repl.

\item Profiles of bigger programs are messy.

\item Sorting by function name is useless.
\end{itemize}

\textbf{Solution:}
\begin{itemize}

\item Save the profile to a file.

\item Reload the profile and analyze the stats on the profile.
\end{itemize}
\end{frame}

\begin{frame}[fragile]
\frametitle{Save the Profile}


Let's save the profile to a file.

\end{frame}

\begin{frame}[fragile]
\frametitle{Line Profiler}

\begin{itemize}

\item line\_profiler is a third party profiling library.

\item pip install line\_profiler

\item line-by-line stats on execution time.
\end{itemize}

\begin{Verbatim}[commandchars=\\\{\}]

\end{Verbatim}

\end{frame}

\begin{frame}[fragile]
\frametitle{Memory Profiler}

\begin{itemize}

\item memory\_profiler is a third party library for determining memory consumption.

\item pip install memory\_profiler

\item line-by-line stats on cumulative memory usage.
\end{itemize}
\end{frame}

\begin{frame}[fragile]
\frametitle{Micro Benchmarks with timeit}

\begin{itemize}

\item \DUroletitlereference{timeit} module is used to profile individual statements or blocks in the code.

\item Runs the code multiple times to collect more data points.

\item Resilient to OS noise.
\end{itemize}
